metadata.description: Ready-to-use collection of modular extensions for Claude Code including commands, sub-agents, skills, and hooks for various development scenarios

plugins.name: Application Security Plugin
plugins.description: Comprehensive application security toolkit for identifying vulnerabilities, analyzing risks, and validating dependencies at an expert level

agents.name: AppSec Specialist Agent
agents.description: Expert security analyst for comprehensive codebase security reviews

commands.name: Security Review
commands.description: Perform comprehensive security analysis of codebase using the AppSec Specialist agent

installation.instructions: Install via Claude Code plugin marketplace: /plugin install appsec@e-stpierre/claude-plugins
requirements: Claude Code CLI v2.0.13 or higher
